title: Alquiler de casa o chalet independiente en Manacor Centro
description:
This finca is a traditional finca in a beautiful location near Manacor perfect connacted to all private schools.
 Large well-kept plot with a beautiful garden, pool and barbecue area has a total area of 7500 sq. m. The living area of Finca is around 300sqm.
It has a living room with a fireplace and a dining area, an open-plan kitchen equipped with all necessary appliances, 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. 
The city of Manacor is located only 7 km from the site. The nearest beach can be reached by car in no more than 10 minutes.

Don t hesistate to contact us for a viewing.
